content: With the Copper Pill Soak equipped, after using the gourd, the next Rock Solid cast costs no mana for a short duration. If you are using the Rock Solid spell, then this can be an incredibly useful addition to your build, giving you free uses of the spell, without needing to refill your mana as much. However, if you are not using the spell, then other Soaks will be more worthwhile.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Copper_Pill.md', within the main section titled 'Copper Pill'.
The content is as follows:
With the Copper Pill Soak equipped, after using the gourd, the next Rock Solid cast costs no mana for a short duration. If you are using the Rock Solid spell, then this can be an incredibly useful addition to your build, giving you free uses of the spell, without needing to refill your mana as much. However, if you are not using the spell, then other Soaks will be more worthwhile.
